EXCave.EXCave_EnterFloor_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]呵呵，[etc:Wait frame="8"/]我都有点等得不耐烦了。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]汝想当老朽的弟子吧？[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
什么都不必说，老朽全都看穿了！[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]老朽啊⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
可以说是[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]当多虑登峰造极之人[System:Color name="Default"]。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/]这里一共有“[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]十个题目[System:Color name="Default"]”。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
只要汝能完美解答，老朽就会授予汝[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]段位[System:Color name="Default"]哦。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]这个嘛，很久没有收过入门弟子了⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
老朽考虑一下也不是不可以给汝珍藏品作为[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]奖励[System:Color name="Default"]哦。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]那么，赶快开始修行吧！
EXCave.EXCave_EnterFloor_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8a9e76a763e74bce9db635735f40a936" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]呵呵，汝又来了啊。[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
通过修行来学习当多虑的深奥之处吧！
EXCave.EXCave_EnterFloor_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3abbd4ea76c644c38e407a9b970ab0cd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]等汝很久了！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
不是说要把当多虑锻炼到登峰造极吗？
EXCave.EXCave_EnterFloor_03_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5957e7ec3cce47ee9c4db2409bdee195" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]这些全都是老朽费尽心力制作的，[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
汝无论要挑战几次都可以。
EXCave.EXCave_Lose_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="728796e5da4445b1a0e985982538c8c9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]不行不行，[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
当多虑之路可不是一天就能练成。
EXCave.EXCave_Lose_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="47099fbd866943378088d21d24554273" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]喝、喝！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
汝的当多虑还不行啊！
EXCave.EXCave_Lose_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="867886a3c3d64bf2b1ddcac5c5d83a09" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]失败是成功之母⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
不要气馁，继续挑战。
EXCave.EXCave_Win_General_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2d6b73f1cc45466bb6d164f2c7a81130" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]呵呵，合格！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
老朽会在下一层等汝哦。
EXCave.EXCave_Win_General_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c9ca5f93df044fdfb94733716baee913" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]完美的当多虑！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
那么，接下来会如何呢？
EXCave.EXCave_Win_General_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="590f983f87ab4c2db82c074c9baa2eb3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]有点太简单了吗⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
老朽是时候该认真起来了。
EXCave.EXCave_Win_GetWhiteOnyon_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="91539b6d25294987872f4bf257aeca7c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]完美！[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
授与汝那个[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]白色欧拟蛹[System:Color name="Default"]吧。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="91539b6d25294987872f4bf257aeca7c" Scale="1"/]汝能跟得上老朽的步伐修行到此⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
说明汝很有前途。[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="91539b6d25294987872f4bf257aeca7c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]但是，修行仍将继续，[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
接下来就专心挑战吧。
EXCave.EXCave_Win_GetWhiteOnyon_99_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c2f4a45e5f7c4ca582995051b7718d81" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]技术精湛，令人望而出神，[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
真不愧是老朽的弟子！
EXCave.EXCave_Win_GetPurpleOnyon_99_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="aacfa51526bf4a42bdfef0d578e832f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]无论看几次，汝的当多虑都相当厉害，[etc:Wait frame="15"/]

EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_00_P00:
